title: Pedro Jose de Ornelas (Avenida de)
body: It is the former path of Pena, and extends from the old street of Hortas, now Alferes Veiga Pestana, to the Levada de Santa Luzia. Pedro José de Ornelas was the president of the Municipal Council of Funchal and passed away on January 12, 1878, at the age of 59.

Funchal: Municipal Council of Funchal, Rua das Hortas, Alferes Veiga Pestana, Levada de Santa Luzia

Pedro José de Ornelas: President of the Municipal Council of Funchal

1878: Passing of Pedro José de Ornelas
